All Implemented Interfaces:
MonsterControler, TankControler
public class SpaceInvadersMaVa
extends SpaceInvaders
implements TankControler, MonsterControler

A space invader game.

Author:
Gallet Guyon

Constructor Detail

SpaceInvadersMaVa

public SpaceInvadersMaVa(Display d)
Initialize the game.
This is the default constructor. It set all to default value. If you don't want to use this default characteristic use another constructor

Parameters:
d - The display object to use.

SpaceInvadersMaVa

public SpaceInvadersMaVa(int nbMonsters,
                         int nbTanks,
                         Display d)
Initialize the game.
This constructor sets the X axis to 300, and the Y axis to 300 too.
If you don't want to use this default characteristic use another constructors

Parameters:
nbMonsters - Set the number of Monster you want instantiate (with default constructors, it sets to 20)
nbTanks - Set the number of Tank you want instantiate (with default constructors, it sets to 20)
d - The display object to use.

SpaceInvadersMaVa

public SpaceInvadersMaVa(int nbMonsters,
                         int nbTanks,
                         Coordinates max,
                         Display d)
Initialize the game.
This constructor uses default value of acceleration

Parameters:
nbMonsters - Set the number of Monster you want instantiate (with default constructors, it sets to 20)
nbTanks - Set the number of Tank you want instantiate (with default constructors, it sets to 20)
max - Set the Max point of the grid (Coordinates)
d - The display object to use.

SpaceInvadersMaVa

public SpaceInvadersMaVa(int nbMonsters,
                         int nbTanks,
                         Coordinates max,
                         int sleepTime,
                         Display d)
Initialize the game.
This constructor no default value.

Parameters:
nbMonsters - Set the number of Monster you want instantiate (with default constructors, it sets to 20)
nbTanks - Set the number of Tank you want instantiate (with default constructors, it sets to 20)
max - Set the Max point of the grid (Coordinates)
sleepTime - Set the time between each move of monster (in milliseconds)
d - The display object to use.

SpaceInvadersMaVa

public SpaceInvadersMaVa(int nbMonsters,
                         int nbTanks,
                         Coordinates max,
                         int sleepTime,
                         int acceleration,
                         Display d)
Initialize the game.
This constructor uses no default value.

Parameters:
nbMonsters - Set the number of Monster you want instantiate (with default constructors, it sets to 20)
nbTanks - Set the number of Tank you want instantiate (with default constructors, it sets to 20)
max - Set the Max point of the grid (Coordinates)
sleepTime - Set the time between each move of monster (in milliseconds)
acceleration - Set the acceleration of Invaders. (not uses for now)
d - The display object to use.
Method Detail

run

public void run()
Main of the thread. It create to other threads for Invaders and for Tanks

Specified by:
run in class SpaceInvaders

waitLoop

public void waitLoop()
This method wait a time in function of sleepTime value and of monster alive's number

Specified by:
waitLoop in interface MonsterControler

monstersMove

public int monstersMove()
This method allows to move Invaders once that is to say to right, down, or left. It follow scheme by itself :
  • right
  • down
  • left
  • down
  • right

Specified by:
monstersMove in interface MonsterControler
Returns:
(integer) this returns the wait time between each move. When it's equals to 0 the game is finished.

monsterShoot

public void monsterShoot()
Method for shoot on tanks. It search the invaders just above tanks and shoot.

Specified by:
monsterShoot in interface MonsterControler

tankMove

public void tankMove()
              throws OutOfGridException
Allows random tank control

Specified by:
tankMove in interface TankControler
Throws:
OutOfGridException - Indicate when Tank want to go over the screen
